keyword: flying dutchman in n out calories
title: Calories in In-N-Out Flying Dutchman
meta_description: Learn the calories in the Flying Dutchman at In-N-Out, a bunless burger with two patties and cheese, plus full nutrition facts, macros, and tweaks for customization.
assumptions: Standard In-N-Out menu item: two 100% beef patties (2 oz each), two slices American cheese, grilled onions; no bun, spread, or additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, exact preparation, and customizations. Values based on standard In-N-Out data; check app or receipt for latest.

quick_answer.text: The In-N-Out Flying Dutchman provides ~390 kcal with high protein and low carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging or apps.

tweaks.label: Add fresh tomato slice and lettuce

faqs.q: How many calories in the Flying Dutchman at In-N-Out?
faqs.a: Approximately 390 calories for the standard version.

faqs.q: Is the In-N-Out Flying Dutchman low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, only about 2 g carbs, making it keto-friendly without the bun.

faqs.q: How much protein in Flying Dutchman In-N-Out?
faqs.a: Around 30 g of protein from the two beef patties.

faqs.q: How does Flying Dutchman calories compare to a regular In-N-Out burger?
faqs.a: Lower at 390 kcal vs. ~480 for a hamburger with bun; saves carbs and calories.

faqs.q: Can I customize the Flying Dutchman at In-N-Out?
faqs.a: Yes—add spread, veggies, or extra patties; each tweak can add 10–100 kcal.
